description: Detective Kevin Desormeau has made hundreds of arrests in his decade on the force. But prosecutors now say he struggled with one aspect of police work: telling the truth.
title: The Case Against an N.Y.P.D. Detective
title_page: The Case Against an N.Y.P.D. Detective - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Detective Kevin Desormeau has made hundreds of arrests in his decade on the force. But prosecutors now say he struggled with one aspect of police work: telling the truth.
